Home.title: Home Page
Home.description: FilmIsBest.com was created by YusifAliyevPro. You can watch all the movies you want with subtitle options in English, Turkish and both languages. It is also possible to watch Movie Trailers.

About.title: About
About.description: This website was born out of necessity. In March 2022, it was my turn to bring a movie to our weekly movie club with friends. However, my memory card didn't work, so I spent 3-4 hours creating this website to upload the movies.

About.text1: This website was born out of necessity. In March 2022, it was my turn to bring a movie to our weekly movie club with friends. However, my memory card didn't work, so I spent 3-4 hours creating this website to upload the movies.
About.text2: In the early months, the website was very static and consisted only of HTML. However, over the next year, I continued to work on the website and develop my skills. This year, I rewrote the website using the NextJS Framework, which I had recently learned.
About.text3: Although I have currently stopped active development on the website, I sometimes make minor changes.
